translation.en: All right. We're good to go.
You got this? You bet your ass, bubba.
Mmm. Let's make some money!
Everyone in position.
Well, I thought we'd be robbin' banks by now,
translation.ja: ガソリンでなく銀行を襲うはずだろ

translation.en: not some gas truck in the middle of nowhere.
translation.ja: ガソリンでなく銀行を襲うはずだろ ガソリンは金塊と同じ

translation.en: Down here gas is gold, bubba.
translation.ja: ガソリンは金塊と同じ

translation.en: Give me that. [ Feedback Squeals ]
translation.ja: お前なんかすぐ捕まっちまう

translation.en: Kill the chatter! Game time.
I wouldn't piss him off, guys.
♪[ Continues ] [ Spanish ]
Okay, guys, we're gonna have to hit this hard and fast. We got four "K" left before the downgrade. [ Horn Honks ]
translation.ja: 素早くやるぞ４キロ先からは下り坂だ

translation.en: Locked and loaded!
This is all you, Han.
Ha! Liquid gold. Ha-ha!
- We're clear. - Okay, T. You're up.
translation.ja: 頂きだ テゴ 行け

translation.en: Let's see if you can get it under six tries this time, huh, T.?
translation.ja: うまく車の向きを変えろ

translation.en: It's more like three. Come on, Tego. Keep it real.
There's one "K" left. We're running out of road.
Get in there, brother. Got it. I got it.
Oh, shit!
T., cut loose! Unhitch! Unhitch!
translation.ja: テゴ 連結器を外せ！

translation.en: - Spray that hitch! - I don't have a hammer!
translation.ja: 凍らせろ！ ハンマーがない

translation.en: Just do it!
- Hold on! Hold on! - No shit!
translation.ja: つかまれ！ ヤバすぎる！

translation.en: Hold on to something tight!
Letty! Give me your hand!
I can't reach! You gotta jump!
translation.ja: 届かない 跳ぶんだ

translation.en: Jump!
Letty, jump!
I got you!
Dom.
Dom?
Dom!
- Oye, oye, oye, oye. - Hold it.
translation.ja: 親類が空軍の基地にいる

translation.en: [ Spanish ] How you doin'?
Money, money!
- Yo, why your stack is bigger than mine always? - There you go.
, ¿eh? - No, I'm supersized, baby. - Y tú qu
[ Spanish ] Okay. Hey, hey, man. Thank you.
Cops just raided our garage in Baracoa. They're real interested in you.
translation.ja: サツに車庫を急襲されたお前を追ってるぞ

translation.en: Heat's on, and we just sent up a flare that's gonna lead 'em right to us.
translation.ja: 今日はハデにやりすぎた

translation.en: I say we move out first thing in the morning.
Nah, it's me they want.
And if they catch me, they're throwin' big numbers at anybody with me.
translation.ja: 俺と一緒にパクられると重い刑をくらう

translation.en: Han, we had a good run.
Time for you to go do your own thing.
Heard they're doin' some crazy shit in Tokyo.
You seen Letty?
There she is.
I hear Rio is nice this time of year.
The cops are getting hungrier.
Then I guess we're doin' our job.
I'm a walking target. I don't want you around when they catch up to me.
translation.ja: 標的はこの俺さそばに いないほうがいい

translation.en: "Ride or die," remember?
Dom, how long have we been doing this?
translation.ja: トラック強盗を何年やった？

translation.en: And now all of a sudden, out of nowhere, it's too dangerous?
translation.ja: なのに急におじけづいたわけ？

translation.en: Come on.
We'll figure it out. We always do.
translation.ja: 力を合わせて また乗り切るの

translation.en: I don't know shit! I don't know shit, man! Give me a name!
translation.ja: よせ 名前を言え 手配役のだ

translation.en: David Park! David Park's the guy you want!
translation.ja: デビッド･パーク  パークだよ

translation.en: Please!
Oh, thank God.
Listen, he's in a mood, because yesterday was his cheat day, and then today some genius brought in doughnuts.
translation.ja: 減量中にドーナツの差し入れ

translation.en: Oh, great.
Sorry I'm late. [ Door Closes ]
Complaints keep rolling in after your little downtown Olympics, O'Conner.
translation.ja: ハデな追いかけっこで苦情が殺到だ

translation.en: Tell me that reinstating you wasn't a mistake.
- [ Typing ] - I got a name. David Park.
translation.ja: 手配役はデビッド･パーク

translation.en: That's it? That's all you got? David Park?
translation.ja: それだけ？デビッド･パーク？ 中国人が よく使う名前だ

translation.en: I could throw a fortune cookie out this window and hit 50 David Parks right now.
translation.ja: 中国人が よく使う名前だ

translation.en: It's Korean, not Chinese. Whatever.
translation.ja: 韓国人よ そうかい

translation.en: Park is a scout that recruits street racers to be mules for the Braga cartel.
translation.ja: パークが麻薬の運び屋を集めてる

translation.en: We find Park, and we bust the bad guys.
Dímelo. Dom.
Mia, I told you not to call me here.
translation.ja: ミア かけるなと言ったろ

translation.en: Dom, it's Letty.
She's been murdered.
Facial recognition software matched Toretto... about 10 minutes after he crossed the border.
translation.ja: ドミニク･トレットが国境を越えたようだ

translation.en: I don't get it. Thought he'd show.
translation.ja: 葬儀に来るかと思ったが

translation.en: I told you not to come. They're staking the place out.
translation.ja: 兄さん 危険よもし見つかったら…

translation.en: If they find you-- They won't.
translation.ja: 兄さん 危険よもし見つかったら… 大丈夫さ

translation.en: Aw, come on. Look at you.
translation.ja: 心配するな  何だ その顔

translation.en: Letty wouldn't let them junk it.
Even though it has a goddamn curse.
translation.ja: 昔 壊した車だけど

translation.en: When she came back, she was always in here,
translation.ja: ロスに来た時はいつも―

translation.en: working on it day and night.
translation.ja: 一日中 修理してた

translation.en: It was weird.
It was like she knew you were coming back.
I want to see the crash site.
I just got off the phone with Deputy Director Lawson.
translation.ja: 今 副長官と話してきた

translation.en: If we don't make serious inroads into the Braga case in the next 72 hours, they're gonna shut us down.
translation.ja: ３日以内に進展がないと捜査は中止だそうだ

translation.en: Well, I know I'm a newbie here, but why the clock now?
Because it's been two years,
and the last three agents we sent in to infiltrate his organization...
translation.ja: 今回の潜入捜査官３名もブラガに殺された

translation.en: have come back in body bags.
translation.ja: 今回の潜入捜査官３名もブラガに殺された やつの麻薬組織は過去最大だ

translation.en: He's moved more heroin across the border than Escobar did in 10 years.
translation.ja: やつの麻薬組織は過去最大だ

translation.en: This guy is becoming one of our biggest national threats,
translation.ja: 国への大きな脅威なのに顔写真もない 国への大きな脅威なのに顔写真もない 〝死亡･･レティ〞

translation.en: and we don't even have a picture of him.
translation.ja: 国への大きな脅威なのに顔写真もない 〝死亡･･レティ〞

translation.en: We don't have prints! Not even a goddamn D.O.B.
translation.ja: 指紋も分からん生年月日も不明だ

translation.en: What's the status on David Park?
Isn't he our ticket into the Braga organization?
We're running the name through city and county databases, sorting the possibilities.
translation.ja: 今 データベースを当たってます

translation.en: We've got over 500 already.
Park's insignificant. Sounds like another jerk-off to me.
translation.ja: パークはただのザコです

translation.en: It's not. Without Park, Braga wouldn't have drivers to move his shipments.
translation.ja: やつが運び屋の候補を集めてる

translation.en: Cross-check traffic-- illegal modifications, street racing.
translation.ja: 交通違反や違法改造 ストリート･レース必ず前科がある

translation.en: This guy will definitely have a record. We'll find him.
translation.ja: ストリート･レース必ず前科がある

translation.en: We better.
Well, what do you know? Your boy Toretto's red Chevelle's been spotted in his old neighborhood.
translation.ja: 君の友人 トレットの車が自宅近くで目撃された

translation.en: I'm gonna bring his ass in.
Not in your car you're not.
It's straight ahead.
You found something back there.
There were burn marks on the ground.
The kind that could only be caused by nitrometh.
translation.ja: ニトロを使ってる車のだ

translation.en: There's only one guy in all of L.A. that sells that.
translation.ja: そんな車を売る男は１人

translation.en: Nothing you can do is gonna bring her back, Dom.
translation.ja: レティは生き返らないわ

translation.en: If I were Letty, I would ask you-- no, I would beg you--
translation.ja: 彼女ならこう言う 違うわ こう願う“早く忘れて”

translation.en: please, let this go.
translation.ja: 違うわ こう願う“早く忘れて”

translation.en: Before it's too late.
It's already too late.
I love you.
Miss Toretto.
I'm, uh, Michael Stasiak, F.B.I. Let's you and I have a little chat.
translation.ja: ＦＢＩのスタジアックですちょっと話が

translation.en: Hi. This is Forsythe in Evidence. I need Stasiak down here right away to sign some greenies.
translation.ja: 証拠課だがスタジアックを下に来させてくれ

translation.en: Hey. So, I've narrowed it down to 50 or so David Parks. What I'd like you to do is run the make and model on each one of 'em.
translation.ja: “パーク”を50人に絞った所有車両を調べてくれ

translation.en: Hey, Tyler, we got a transfer.
You want to come with me?
Toretto. When'd you get back in town?
translation.ja: トレット いつ戻った

translation.en: I'm lookin' for a car you did an engine mod on.
Nitromethane tank. Ford full size. Continental tires.
translation.ja: ニトロ仕様のフォードコンチネンタル･タイヤ

translation.en: Okay, what are--What are you-- What are you doin', comin' in here like this, huh?
translation.ja: 何の用でここへ来たんだよ

translation.en: This ain't your scene anymore, boss. Don't ever put your hands on me again, okay?
translation.ja: あんたは過去の存在だ従う義理はねえ

translation.en: Say hi to your sister for me.
Korean kid brought it in. David Park.
translation.ja: 韓国人のデビッド･パークだ

translation.en: It-- It's a green Ford Torino. Please don't drop this on me.
translation.ja: 緑のフォード トリノをここへ殺さねえでくれ

translation.en: I'm almost done.
Why don't you tell me why you dragged me here, Brian?
translation.ja: なぜここへ？ ブライアン

translation.en: You know they're gonna capture Dom. Maybe worse.
translation.ja: 皆がドムを追ってる命も危ない

translation.en: I don't want you gettin' tangled up in this, so stay away from him.
translation.ja: 危険だから彼に近づくな

translation.en: That's what you have to say to me after five years?
All of a sudden you care what happens to me.
What I did to you was wrong.
I'm sorry. It was-- It was the hardest thing I ever had to do.
translation.ja: だますなんて俺もつらかったさ

translation.en: I'm sorry too, Brian.
I'm so sorry that you had to come into my home and pretend to love me.
translation.ja: 私を愛してるフリをしなきゃならなかった

translation.en: I'm so sorry that you ripped my family apart. I'm very sorry that that was hard for you.
translation.ja: 兄と妹を引き離すのもつらかったでしょ？

translation.en: I lied to you.
I lied to Dom. I lied to everybody. That's what I do best. That's why the feds recruited me.
translation.ja: 皆も欺いたウソの天才だからＦＢＩに雇われた

translation.en: Maybe you're lying to yourself.
Maybe you're not the good guy pretending to be a bad guy.
translation.ja: 悪人を演じてるウソつきかも

translation.en: Maybe you're the bad guy pretending to be the good guy. You ever think about that?
translation.ja: それとも善人を演じてる悪人？考えたことある？

translation.en: Every day.
I always wondered--
Why'd you let my brother go that day?
I don't know.
Brian! I got the cross-checks on David Park back and have a list of possibles.
translation.ja: 50人の中からさらにパークを絞ったわ

translation.en: What do you got? Forty-five-year-old male in a six Scion with three reckless driving tickets.
translation.ja: 45歳の男2006年型サイオンを所有

translation.en: No. An '01 Chevy Tahoe.
No. Two Mini Coopers-- a six and a seven.
translation.ja: ミニクーパーとトヨタ プリウスの男

translation.en: A Toyota hybrid. Hell, no.
translation.ja: ミニクーパーとトヨタ プリウスの男 違う

translation.en: '98 Saturn. A '95 Sebring.
translation.ja: サターンと違法改造の240ＳＸの男

translation.en: A '98 Nissan 240 with an illegal mod. Wait.
translation.ja: サターンと違法改造の240ＳＸの男 これだこの違法な改造車の男

translation.en: That's it. What?
translation.ja: これだこの違法な改造車の男

translation.en: The 240 with the illegal mod. How do you know?
translation.ja: これだこの違法な改造車の男 なぜ？

translation.en: Because that's something I'd drive.
Green Torino, runnin' nitro.
translation.ja: 緑色のトリノ  ニトロ仕様だれの車だ？

translation.en: Whose car? I don't know, man.
translation.ja: 緑色のトリノ  ニトロ仕様だれの車だ？ 知らねえ 俺は代行屋だ

translation.en: I'm just the middleman, I swear. I'm just the middleman!
translation.ja: 知らねえ 俺は代行屋だ

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait. [ Panting ]
I don't know shit, man. I swear.
translation.ja: ブラガの車をメンテしてるだけだ

translation.en: I just run cars for Braga. All right?
translation.ja: ブラガの車をメンテしてるだけだ それとレースの手配も

translation.en: - All I can do is get you in the race. That's all I can do. - What race?
translation.ja: それとレースの手配も レースって？

translation.en: Help! Come on, man! Let me up, man!
Come on!
Come on, man! I don't know shit! Just let me up!
translation.ja: 知らねえよ 助けてくれ

translation.en: - I-- I told you, you gotta talk to Braga! - Bring him up, Dom.
translation.ja: ブラガに聞けよ やめろ

translation.en: Oh, God! Don't drop me! That's all I know!
translation.ja: 落とすな 全部 話した

translation.en: Bring him up. Yeah, listen to him!
- You gonna take me in, O'Conner? - Oh, shit! Oh, shit!
translation.ja: 逮捕か？ オコナー ヤバい  助けて

translation.en: Shut up!
Letty was my friend too. You weren't anyone's friend.
translation.ja: レティは残念だ 口先だけだろ

translation.en: Yo, can you guys talk about this later? Now pull my ass up!
translation.ja: 話してねえで引き上げろ！ 運び屋をしてて消されたんだホシは必ず俺が

translation.en: She was running for this guy Braga, and things went bad. Please! Oh, shit! I'm gonna get these guys, Dom.
translation.ja: 運び屋をしてて消されたんだホシは必ず俺が

translation.en: Now let me do my job and bring him up.
I'm gonna kill this Braga--
and anyone else who gets in my way.
Don't let go.
O'Conner!
O'Conner! If you ever release a witness of mine again--
translation.ja: 今度 私の参考人を勝手に帰したら…

translation.en: - Shit. - That's enough!
- Don't touch me. I'm fine. - That's enough.
- You're through, O'Conner! - I said, that's enough!
translation.ja: 許さん いい加減にしろ

translation.en: Stasiak, go get yourself cleaned up.
Wh-What? He hit me first! You-- You--
This isn't the Cub Scouts!
Now, go on! You're bleedin' on my floor.
translation.ja: 手当てしろ床に血がたれてる

translation.en: O'Conner, do you know the difference between a cop and a criminal?
translation.ja: 警官と犯罪者の違いは？

translation.en: What? One bad judgment call.
Keep your shit in line, son.
Have a good time.
Take a seat.
Good news. We have intel that Braga's number two, Ramon Campos,
translation.ja: いい知らせだブラガの右腕カンポスが―

translation.en: will hold a street race in Koreatown tomorrow night to fill a slot on his team.
translation.ja: 明日の晩運び屋を選ぶレースを行う

translation.en: They've already chosen three drivers from previous races.
translation.ja: 既にこの３人が選ばれてる

translation.en: Our newest informant, Mr. David Park, has been kind enough to get us into the race.
translation.ja: 寝返ったパークが我々を明日のレースに

translation.en: O'Conner, you're up.
translation.ja: オコナー  レースに出ろ

translation.en: Let me guess. Winner gets the slot.
All right. So these are all the imports the city has in impound.
translation.ja: これが押収した外車よ

translation.en: Okay, nice. Pick your poison.
All right. Uh, 2206. I crashed one of those.
Okay. So which one do you want?
I want 'em all.
Standard issue tracking device. Boss wants to know where you are at all times.
translation.ja: 追跡用の発信機部長が“付けろ”と

translation.en: You wanna play with this?
Hey! What you lookin' at, nutsack?
translation.ja: 何 見てんだよ マヌケ野郎

translation.en: I don't know. You tell me.
Oh. The racer wants what Dwight's got. See, but, ladies, Dwight's already on the team.
translation.ja: このドワイト様はブラガのドライバーだぜ

translation.en: - 'Cause you gotta be fast if you wanna drive for Braga. - Is there a problem here?
translation.ja: メチャ速いから 何か問題が？

translation.en: No.
- You one of Park's guys, blondie? - Yeah. Yeah, I am.
translation.ja: パークの紹介？ ああ そうだ

translation.en: Follow me.
See you later, punk.
You too, punk.
Bull's-eye, coño. Come on.
Oh! We could do this all day. Dame, dame, dame, dame, dame.
translation.ja: こいつは最高の賭けだ

translation.en: You all know why you're here?
Good drivers...
are a dime a dozen.
translation.ja: 大勢いる ストリート･レースをやるやつも多い

translation.en: Man, every corner's got a chingadera tuner racing for pinks.
translation.ja: ストリート･レースをやるやつも多い

translation.en: That's not what Braga's got me looking for.
translation.ja: だがブラガが望むのは―

translation.en: Braga wants someone that would sell their abuelita to be behind the wheel.
translation.ja: 車のためなら家族を売るような男だ

translation.en: Someone that drives their 10-second cars not in a straight line,
translation.ja: 直線だけ速いんじゃなく―

translation.en: but to push it and make it through places... no one else would take it.
translation.ja: 最高のテクを持った者を歓迎する

translation.en: Real drivers, ¿entiendes?
So, what are we haulin'?
Oye, for the money Braga's paying, you don't need to know.
translation.ja: 知らなくて いいことだ

translation.en: You just said you wanted real drivers.
A real driver knows exactly what's in his car.
translation.ja: 積み荷も知っときたい

translation.en: Mira. Real driver.
Nobody's forcing you to race. You the boss?
translation.ja: イヤなら帰れ ボスか？

translation.en: Or am I talkin' to the boss?
Do I look like a boss?
Papi. My job is to find the best drivers... period.
translation.ja: いいドライバーを見つけるのが目的だ

translation.en: Whoever wins the race gets the info. We cool?
translation.ja: 勝った者に何でも教えるいいか？

translation.en: Are we cool?
Yeah, we're cool.
Uh, no, we ain't cool, man. Uh, who's closing these streets?
translation.ja: ちょい待てよだれが通りを封鎖する？

translation.en: [ Chuckling ] No one. That's the point.
[ Female Computerized Voice ] Please wait while directions are downloaded.
translation.ja: ルートをダウンロード中

translation.en: Proceed to the highlighted route.
Ten,
nine,
eight,
- six-- - You sure you want to do this?
five-- A lot has changed.
four-- You're right.
three,
two,
one.
Go!
[ Computer ] Right turn ahead.
You are now five miles from your destination.
How my ass look, Chia Pet?
Ghetto Smurf.
Dead man drivin'.
Come on!
[ Computer ] Right turn ahead.
Oh, shit!
- Damn. - Rerouting.
translation.ja: 間一髪だ ルート再検索

translation.en: [ Computer ] Rerouting.
Proceed straight ahead.
Rerouting.
Rerouting. Would you shut up?
translation.ja: ルート再検索 うるさい！

translation.en: You are 2.6 miles from destination.
Oops. I didn't see you.
You are now four and one half miles from your destination.
translation.ja: 現在ゴールまで7.2キロです

translation.en: U-turn if possible. Are you kidding me?
You are now 4.2 miles from your destination.
translation.ja: 現在ゴールまで6.8キロです

translation.en: Sorry, car.
You are now one mile from your destination.
Yeah! Guess who's back, Dom!
Let's go!
Nice car, baby!
Bitch!
You are now one quarter mile from your destination.
Too early, Dom.
- No! - Still a buster.
- [ Whooping ] - You have reached your destination. Good-bye.
translation.ja: ゴールインです  サヨナラ

translation.en: At least we know you can't beat me straight up.
- I didn't know there were any rules. - i'Tremendo, jefe!
i'Así me gusta! Now that's what I call real driving.
translation.ja: 見事な腕だ 最低だぜ

translation.en: No, that's bullshit, man! Go cry to your mama, eh?
You work for Braga now.
When the G.P.S. calls, you follow.
Driver's license. What driver's license?
translation.ja: 免許証は？ 免許証って？

translation.en: - Thumb. - [ Beeping ]
Cell phone number.
The print's for Campos. The number is for me.
translation.ja: 指紋はカンポスに番号は私のため

translation.en: Yo, nutsack! Let me tell you somethin', man.
translation.ja: マヌケ野郎 日本車はＶ８には絶対 勝てねえ

translation.en: Muscle beats import every time.
translation.ja: 日本車はＶ８には絶対 勝てねえ

translation.en: You know what I'm sayin'? Every time!
translation.ja: 分かるか？ 絶対にだ！

translation.en: [ Laughing ] Ladies, let's get on back to Papa Dwight's.
Papa Dwight wants you to take off your shoes.
Come on. Dwight likes feet. Take off your shoes.
translation.ja: 足が好きだ  靴を脱いで

translation.en: So beautiful.
[ Chuckles ] Oh, Dwight likes this foot a lot. Mmm!
Mmm. Daddy Dwight loves your foot--
- F.B.I.! - [ Screams ]
translation.ja: ＦＢＩだ！ 何なんだよ俺は何もやってないぜ

translation.en: Hey! Yo, what you doin'? I didn't do nothin', man! Dwight didn't do nothin'!
translation.ja: 何なんだよ俺は何もやってないぜ

translation.en: Hey, yo, stay, stay! Where you goin'?
Bye, Dwight. Yo, what did I do? Ow!
You're under arrest for distribution of meth.
Meth? Dwight's never touched that shit, bro!
- Dwight has now. - Yo, that ain't mine!
translation.ja: そうか？ インチキだ

translation.en: No, get off me! You know that's never gonna stick, right?
Ow! Yeah, it's not supposed to.
Yeah. Corona.
That's too bad about Dwight. Havin' the feds raid your house the same night you make the team.
translation.ja: ドワイトは気の毒だガサ入れとはな

translation.en: That's unfortunate.
I wish I could say I was surprised to see you here.
translation.ja: ここで再会とは驚いた

translation.en: What's to stop someone from tellin' them you're a cop?
translation.ja: 正体をバラしはしねえ

translation.en: Probably the same thing that's keeping me from tellin' 'em why you're really here.
translation.ja: お前の狙いもバラさないさ

translation.en: What up, fellas? Hey, how you doin'?
Great. You havin' a good time?
Yeah, a great time. Come on. Let's have a better time.
translation.ja: ああ ちょっと来い

translation.en: How's your car? You took a nasty bump.
translation.ja: 車は？ かなり壊れただろ

translation.en: It'll be ready.
I also heard you just got out of County.
translation.ja: 最近 出所したんだって？

translation.en: You know a guy named Jim Garcia?
Nah. Big place. Lots of names, lots of faces.
translation.ja: 知らない囚人は大勢いたからな

translation.en: And you-- You're wanted by a lot of people, homes.
translation.ja: お前はサツに追われてる

translation.en: Man, that kinda heat can't be good for business.
Yeah, well, that depends on how you look at things.
I go down, I do time. I do real time.
translation.ja: 捕まればブチ込まれる本当のムショ暮らしだ

translation.en: I don't know about your other drivers,
translation.ja: だから赤い回転灯を見たら絶対に―

translation.en: but when I see flashing lights in my mirror, I don't stop.
translation.ja: だから赤い回転灯を見たら絶対に― ブッちぎるぜ

translation.en: Do you know each other?
He used to date my sister.
I see.
You're a lucky man.
- How's that? - You're still breathing.
translation.ja: 何が？ まだ生きてて

translation.en: To the ladies we've loved and the ladies we've lost. Salud. Salud.
translation.ja: 愛してる女たちと別れた女たちに

translation.en: So, what's Braga about?
You know, he's just one of us. Came up from the streets. Down for el barrio.
translation.ja: ブラガは街で大物になり仲間を大事にした

translation.en: Now he's a shot caller. The boss of bosses.
translation.ja: 今は皆のボスとして命令を下してる

translation.en: See all these cats in here? Mm-hmm. Any one of 'em would die for Braga.
translation.ja: ここの連中は皆ボスのためになら死ぬ

translation.en: Including you?
Especially me.
Enjoy the party, fellas. Club's yours. Whatever you want-- booze, broads-- it's all good.
translation.ja: 楽しんでくれ酒も女もタダだからな

translation.en: Braga's mine.
I'm taking the whole house down.
Good luck.
Something interest you about this car?
Just admiring the body work.
Are you one of those boys who prefers cars to women?
translation.ja: 女より車のほうがいいっていう人？

translation.en: I'm one of those boys that appreciates a fine body regardless of the make.
translation.ja: 最高のボディにはホレ込んじまう

translation.en: Your car?
It's Fenix's car.
You met him at the rendezvous. He'll be leading you.
translation.ja: ブツを運ぶ前の打ち合わせで会うわ

translation.en: So now that I know your taste in cars,
translation.ja: どんな車が好みなのか分かったから―

translation.en: tell me, what about your women?
translation.ja: どんな車が好みなのか分かったから― 女の好みも教えて

translation.en: Well, it starts with the eyes.
She's gotta have those kinda eyes... that can look right through the bullshit...
translation.ja: ウソを見抜いて人の美点を見る目を―

translation.en: to the good in someone.
Twenty percent angel, 80% devil.
translation.ja: 人格の８割が悪魔的な女

translation.en: Down to earth.
Ain't afraid to get a little engine grease under her fingernails.
translation.ja: 車いじりの好きな女も好みだ

translation.en: That doesn't sound anything like me.
It ain't.
I got a gift for you. All right.
A dirty shot glass. Just what I always wanted.
translation.ja: 汚いグラス  うれしいわ

translation.en: I got these from the club last night.
translation.ja: 指紋が付いてるから調べてくれ

translation.en: There's two sets of prints. Run 'em both. I know one of these is Campos's.
translation.ja: 指紋が付いてるから調べてくれ カンポスと多分 ブラガのだ記録を全部 当たれ

translation.en: I think the other might be Braga's. And you're gonna have to go beyond Interpol.
translation.ja: カンポスと多分 ブラガのだ記録を全部 当たれ

translation.en: So that means I have to contact individual agencies, and that could take weeks.
translation.ja: 何週間もかかるかも しれないわ

translation.en: That's your third traffic violation in less than three blocks.
translation.ja: もう３回も違反をしてるぞ

translation.en: Slow it down, O'Conner.
Sure thing, Dad.
He's stopped.
We lost him.
- He killed the tracker. - We don't know that.
translation.ja: 切った 違う 確かだ

translation.en: - He killed the tracker. - We don't know that yet! Get the bird overhead.
translation.ja: 慌てるな  ヘリを上空に

translation.en: [ Pilot ] Right now I'm moving north 33-56.
translation.ja: 北に飛行中  座標は3356

translation.en: All clear.
[ Pilot ] Base, Black Knight. I'm at Angels Five. I don't have a tally on the target. Repeat: I don't have a tally on the target.
translation.ja: 追跡用の電波をキャッチできません

translation.en: - They're gone. There's no one down there. - Damn it!
translation.ja: 追跡は不可能 クソ！

translation.en: This ain't right, bro. [ Car Doors Close ]
translation.ja: 閉じ込められるなんて知らなかったぜ

translation.en: Nobody said nothin' about being locked in no truck. Tell me about it.
translation.ja: 閉じ込められるなんて知らなかったぜ そうさ

translation.en: Psst! Yo! Where you think they're takin' us?
Don't matter.
We're all just along for the ride now.
translation.ja: 黙って乗ってりゃいい

translation.en: Welcome to Mexico, boys.
There are helicopters and surveillance cameras... that scan for heat signatures at the border,
translation.ja: 国境にはヘリや熱を感知するカメラがある

translation.en: but there are blind spots that I can guide you through via satellite.
translation.ja: でも私がナビで誘導するわ

translation.en: There can be no margin of error, so you must follow my every direction.
translation.ja: ミスは許されないから指示を守って

translation.en: Any questions?
I thought Fenix was gonna be here.
He'll meet you out there.
All right, everybody sync up.
Good luck, gentlemen.
Vaya con Dios.
[ Gisele On Radio ] Satellite link-up engaged.
Keep proceeding northbound at current speed.
Stay close to Fenix.
translation.ja: フェニックスに続いて先導役だから

translation.en: He'll lead you across.
translation.ja: フェニックスに続いて先導役だから “ＵＳ メキシコ国境”

translation.en: I've got a heat signature northbound along Legardo Ravine.
translation.ja: 北に向かう熱反応です

translation.en: Thermal imaging window on the Mexico side's gonna be down for about 45 seconds.
translation.ja: 熱反応の画像表示は45秒で消える

translation.en: Get the camera on it.
Manual override. Rerouting camera to designated coordinates.
translation.ja: 手動操作 カメラを指定の方向へ

translation.en: [ Gisele ] Hurry it up. You guys have been tagged.
translation.ja: 急いで  見つかった

translation.en: Oh, shit.
[ Gisele ] Toretto, get back in formation.
Reimaging commencing.
I don't see anything. They're gone.
Get the helicopters to cover it.
[ Pilot ] Uh, Base, we're 40 seconds out from Legardo Ravine.
[ Gisele ] They're sending a helicopter.
[ Gisele ] You have 30 seconds.
[ Pilot ] North 32-33, west 116-49.
[ Gisele ] The window's closing fast. You need to get out of there before they send ground support.
translation.ja: 警備隊を配置される前に早く抜け出して

translation.en: [ Gisele ] Fifteen seconds.
[ Pilot ] Base, target is at two miles.
[ Gisele ] You're running out of time.
[ Gisele ] You need to get out now!
Uh, Base, we're at, uh, north 32-33, west 116-49.
We have no visual contact. Roll ground units for confirmation.
translation.ja: 異状なし地上からも確認願います

translation.en: Sloppy!
Very sloppy!
What are you doin', man?
Come on. i'Pa'fuera! i'Salte!
Get out!
Come on, man. Come on, today, man. Come on, let's go.
[ Dom ] Yeah, yeah.
translation.ja: おい 俺に触るなよ

translation.en: I said don't touch me, man. Hey, look, dog, don't put your hands on me.
[ Man ] Hey, Malik, chill, bro.
translation.ja: 押すなよ 冷静になれ

translation.en: Yo, man, what's up with your boy?
Hey, boss man!
What did you say?
I said only pussies run nitro-meth.
translation.ja: ニトロを使うのはクサレ野郎だ

translation.en: You looked under my hood?
I'm talkin' to you. You got somethin' on your mind?
translation.ja: 聞いたんだぜ  何か言えよ

translation.en: '70 Plymouth.
Her name was Letty.
Where's my money?
[ Dom ] And somebody wrecked her car.
I wrecked her car.
You remember her face?
'Cause I don't.
Last time I saw it, it was burning.
translation.ja: 見た時 燃えてたぜ

translation.en: Now what?
I'm gonna enjoy what happens next.
Dom, get in!
Get in! Come on!
Get in the fuckin' car! Let's go! Hurry up!
translation.ja: 行くぞ  早く乗るんだ 急げ

translation.en: [ Penning ] What have you got, Trinh?
We're contacting agencies in multiple countries.
translation.ja: 外国のデータも照合中

translation.en: Unfortunately, most of them have to manually scan their prints for us to upload.
translation.ja: デジタル化されてなくて時間が かかってます

translation.en: O'Conner's on line five. And, sir, you should see this.
translation.ja: オコナーが５番にご覧ください

translation.en: [ Beeps ] Talk to me, O'Conner.
Where the hell have you been? I got the shipment.
translation.ja: どこだ 証拠を確保

translation.en: "I" got the shipment, or we got the shipment?
[ O'Conner On Speaker ] What are you talkin' about?
Traffic cams in the area picked up pictures of you and Toretto together.
translation.ja: 監視カメラにトレットも― 映ってた

translation.en: Listen to me, O'Conner. Bring in the shipment and bring in Toretto.
translation.ja: いいか オコナー証拠品とトレットをここへ

translation.en: But I thought the point was to get Braga. We got an opportunity here.
translation.ja: ブラガの逮捕が目的では？

translation.en: Brian, the clock's stopped ticking.
Bring them in. Are we clear?
translation.ja: 連行してこい  いいな？

translation.en: O'Conner? [ Phone Beeps ]
So this is what $60 million looks like.
We gotta get you to a doctor.
We gotta find a place to hide this.
I got a spot.
502, Wet Reckless. I need a 48-hour hold.
translation.ja: 飲酒で押収  48時間 保管だ

translation.en: Out back. Any spot you can find.
You sure about this?
The last place they'll check: their own impound yard. Trust me.
translation.ja: 灯台もと暗しさ警察はこんな所を調べない

translation.en: I've been thinkin'. When you blew up your car back there, you blew up mine too.
translation.ja: さっき俺のＧＴ‐Ｒもフッ飛ばしたな

translation.en: So now you owe me a 10-second car.
Is that right?
Now we're even.
This your way of keeping me away from him?
You're the only one I could call. He's my brother. Of course.
translation.ja: 例外も そうね 身内ですもの

translation.en: Well, the bullet's not in there.
Gonna clean it and stitch it up.
translation.ja: 消毒して縫うわ  痛むわよ

translation.en: It's gonna hurt. I bet you're gonna enjoy this.
translation.ja: 消毒して縫うわ  痛むわよ 楽しむ気だな？

translation.en: A little.
Want some of this? Yeah.
It's spicy. Be careful.
- You like it hot. - Mmm.
Dom, what are you doing? You reached first. You have to say grace.
translation.ja: まだダメよ 兄さんがお祈りして

translation.en: Thank you, Lord,
for blessing this table.
With food... and family...
translation.ja: この食べ物や 家族や―

translation.en: and friendship.
You asked me why I let Dom go.
I think it's because at that moment...
I respected him more than I did myself.
One thing I learned from Dom is that...
nothin' really matters unless you have a code.
And what's your code, Brian?
I'm workin' on it.
- Oh, shit. Hey, Dom-- - When were you gonna tell me?
translation.ja: 誤解だ  ドム 隠してたな

translation.en: - Dom, what are you doing? - When were you gonna tell me you were runnin' Letty?
translation.ja: 兄さん 彼女を潜入捜査に？

translation.en: - Let me explain. - When were you gonna--
- Dom, stop! Stop! - You don't understand.
translation.ja: やめてよ 話を聞け

translation.en: - I don't understand? - Stop!
Dom, stop it! Please stop!
She did it for you, Dom! She did it for you.
translation.ja: お前のためだ 潜入は

translation.en: Letty came to me to clear your name in exchange for bringing down Braga.
translation.ja: 代わりに お前を“無罪に”って

translation.en: She just wanted you to come home!
[ Yells ] I'm sorry, Dom! I'm sorry!
translation.ja: 悪かった ドム 守れなくて

translation.en: [ Sighs ] You better have one hell of an explanation.
You disobeyed a direct order.
translation.ja: 証拠の麻薬はどこにあるんだ？

translation.en: Where's the shipment? It's safe.
translation.ja: 証拠の麻薬はどこにあるんだ？ 安全な所

translation.en: "It's safe."
translation.ja: それだけ？ 押収した麻薬をメディアに―

translation.en: Look, we could use the shipment to parade in front of the media,
translation.ja: 押収した麻薬をメディアに―

translation.en: get a few hundred pounds of heroin off the street,
translation.ja: 公開してもブラガはまた大量の麻薬を―

translation.en: but Braga's just gonna send another shipment next week and the week after that.
translation.ja: 公開してもブラガはまた大量の麻薬を― 密輸する

translation.en: Let's use the shipment to lure Braga out and lop the head off a multi-billion dollar cartel.
translation.ja: 押収品を利用しブラガを挙げるべきだ

translation.en: And how do you suggest we do that?
A hand-to-hand exchange with Braga.
- No, he'll never show. - He can't afford not to.
translation.ja: やつは現れん 必ず来させる

translation.en: You got a plan?
There's a price.
We bag Braga, you let Toretto walk.
translation.ja: トレットを無罪放免に

translation.en: It's Dom.
I was just thinking about you.
You know, when I gave you my number I was hoping you'd call.
translation.ja: かけてきて ほしかった

translation.en: But not under these circumstances.
What circumstances?
Me being alive?
Don't take it personally.
It's just business.
I got some business of my own.
Get Campos.
It's them.
Was that how Braga inspires loyalty?
translation.ja: 俺らを殺してボスへの―

translation.en: Killing his drivers?
One can always find more drivers.
translation.ja: ドライバーは消耗品さ

translation.en: It's just good business.
- I want to trade. - Braga doesn't negotiate.
translation.ja: 取り引きは？ ボスは応じない

translation.en: [ Dom Chuckles ] Fine.
Then you explain to him how all of a sudden $60 million worth of product disappears.
translation.ja: なら“6000万ドルのブツが消えた”と話せ

translation.en: I know that can't be good for business.
What do you want?
Six million cash, delivered by Braga himself.
translation.ja: 600万をブラガ本人に持ってこさせろ

translation.en: [ Dom ] I don't like being shot at.
I ain't gonna put my neck out again unless he's got somethin' to lose too.
translation.ja: だまされたくは ないからな

translation.en: - He'll never go for it. - Either I deal with Braga, or you do.
translation.ja: ボスは断る なら“ヘマした”と― ボスに

translation.en: When and where?
Sir, players are on site. Holding positions at the perimeter.
translation.ja: 準備は完了ＳＷＡＴも周囲に展開

translation.en: All right, listen up. Everybody stay frosty.
We don't move a muscle until O'Conner gives the signal.
translation.ja: オコナーの合図で突入

translation.en: When he gets the money, you know what to do.
Well, the good news is, when we get this guy, you walk outta here a free man.
translation.ja: ブラガを挙げたらお前は自由の身だ

translation.en: Is that what they told you?
Yeah, that's the deal.
You still put milk and cookies out for Santa Claus? [ Chuckles ] Yeah.
translation.ja: サンタを信じるガキと同じだな

translation.en: Here. In case things go shitty.
translation.ja: インプのキーだ  逃走用に

translation.en: Just like old times?
Oye. You dropped something.
That's what you wanted, right? Toma! No, no, hey, Dom.
translation.ja: 泥棒野郎どもめ！ ドム

translation.en: He's harmless. Don't worry about him.
And he's really sorry about Letty.
Where's our stuff?
You mean the stuff that used to be in here, right?
Well, you'll see it when we see Braga. That was the deal.
translation.ja: ブラガが現れたら拝ませてやるぜ

translation.en: No worries. Braga keeps his word.
translation.ja: 心配するなボスは約束を守る

translation.en: Two million.
You get the rest when I get my property.
Stasiak. [ Trinh ] We got a match.
translation.ja: スタジアック 一致よ

translation.en: Fingerprint's Braga's a hundred percent.
Just waiting on facial confirmation via fax.
translation.ja: 今 人相の確認待ち

translation.en: [ Brian ] I got a question for you.
Were you wearin' pink when you were clawin' your way out of el barrio?
translation.ja: ピンクのタイなんかをボスが？

translation.en: Order all agents to move in. We got confirmation.
translation.ja: 突入を命じろ  確認が取れた

translation.en: Primary suspect wearing gray suit. Let's move.
translation.ja: 容疑者はグレーの背広の男

translation.en: Sir, O'Conner hasn't given us the signal yet.
translation.ja: 合図がまだです 指紋が一致した 突入だ

translation.en: What part of that didn't you understand? We just got confirmation. Do it!
translation.ja: 指紋が一致した 突入だ グレーの背広の男を逮捕しろ

translation.en: Secure primary suspect in gray suit.
translation.ja: グレーの背広の男を逮捕しろ

translation.en: Repeat: Secure primary suspect in gray suit.
translation.ja: グレーの背広の男を逮捕

translation.en: You're thinking what I'm thinkin', right?
He ain't Braga.
- Oh, shit. - Drop your weapons!
- F.B.I.! - Get down!
Get outta here!
Get outta here, Dom!
[ Engine Revving ] Run 'em down.
Go! Hey! Campos is Braga!
- Come on. - i'Al otro lado!
Approaching primary target.
Primary suspect is secure.
Get up. [ Man ] He was under your nose the whole time.
Now Braga's escaped, Toretto's heading south, probably long across the border by now.
translation.ja: ブラガを逃がしトレットも今 メキシコだろう

translation.en: - You have any idea the kind of trouble you're in,O'Conner? - I was doin' my job.
translation.ja: マズいぞ オコナー 職務の遂行です

translation.en: Wouldn't be the first bad guy you helped escape the law's grasp.
translation.ja: 前もトレットを逃がした

translation.en: As of now, you're being taken off active duty... until this office can mount a formal inquiry.
translation.ja: 正式な調査をするまで職務から外す

translation.en: What about Braga?
That's no longer your concern.
We now know where Braga is, right?
Customs tracked him via satellite to his home base in Tecale, Mexico.
translation.ja: メキシコのテカールにあるアジト

translation.en: Mexico is out of our jurisdiction.
The fact is, the brass'll be so busy holding press conferences over the seizure,
translation.ja: 大量の麻薬を押収したんだお偉方は我々を―

translation.en: we'll skate under the radar.
I thought we signed on to do the right thing.
Everyone's looking for you.
I'm right here.
It's nice to see you've gone with the times and switched to electronic fuel injection. Looks good.
translation.ja: 電子式 燃料噴射(Ｅ Ｆ Ｉ)エンジンに進化したか

translation.en: Buster became a gearhead.
I'm goin' with you.
I don't plan on bringin' anyone back.
I know.
Hit that throttle.
How do you say good-bye to your only brother?
You don't.
I thought you weren't gonna show up.
You saved my life. I'm willing to return the favor.
translation.ja: 命の恩人ですもの喜んで恩返しするわ

translation.en: This will help get you to Braga.
Dom.
Going in there is suicide.
translation.ja: 行くのは自殺と同じよ

translation.en: I have no choice.
You must have loved her very much.
Vaya con Dios.
This is where my jurisdiction ends.
And this is where mine begins.
translation.ja: ここから復讐が始まる

translation.en: You ain't forgiven.
You boys want to arrest me?
No, we're beyond that.
You can't buy your way outta this one.
Hermano, you and me--
you and me, we not so different.
You're no hero.
You're right.
And that's why you're going back across the border.
translation.ja: アメリカで裁きを受けろ

translation.en: [ Handcuffs Ratcheting ] But Fenix is mine.
You got it.
Shit.
You'll make it a couple of miles out, if you're lucky.
translation.ja: すぐに手下たちが来る

translation.en: You know where you going?
You want to borrow my G.P.S.?
- [ Laughing ] - Where are your boys at?
- They gonna show up or what? - [ Machine Gun Fire ]
Careful what you ask for.
Just stop. Just stop the car.
Right behind you.
Dom, head to the tunnel. Let's use the tunnel.
translation.ja: ドム トンネルへ向かえ

translation.en: Get outta here, Brian.
You sure you know where the tunnels are? You sure?
translation.ja: トンネルの場所が分かるのか？

translation.en: Yeah, I'd hold on.
This might hurt.
You're in my world now, baby!
That's it, baby. End of the road.
Now what?
- Oh! Game over. - No, no, no, no.
translation.ja: 終わり！ まだ行ける

translation.en: Come on!
Get me outta here! [ Coughing ]
Pussy.
Let me see that.
Yeah, just keep pressure there.
[ Sirens Wailing ] You'll be all right.
You gotta get outta here.
I ain't runnin' anymore.
I gotta ask you something.
You know I would've-- I would've won that race if you didn't cheat, right?
translation.ja: あのレース本当は俺の勝ちだよな

translation.en: You hit your head hard.
Don't make me laugh.
All rise.
Please be seated.
Please rise, Mr. Toretto.
I've listened to the testimony... and taken into special consideration...
translation.ja: オコナー捜査官の“寛大な処置を”という求めを―

translation.en: Agent O'Conner's appeal of clemency on behalf of Mr. Toretto,
translation.ja: 裁判長の私も十分 考慮しました

translation.en: that his actions directly resulted...
translation.ja: つまり被告人の活躍で―

translation.en: in the apprehension of known drug trafficker Arturo Braga.
translation.ja: つまり被告人の活躍で― ブラガ逮捕に至ったからです

translation.en: However,
this judiciary finds that...
one right does not make up for a lifetime worth of wrongs,
translation.ja: 今回の行いで過去の罪を帳消しにはできない

translation.en: and as such I find that I am forced to level...
translation.ja: 従って― カリフォルニア州法に基づく刑を言い渡す

translation.en: the maximum sentence under California law.
translation.ja: カリフォルニア州法に基づく刑を言い渡す

translation.en: Dominic Toretto,
you are hereby sentenced to serve 25 years to life...
translation.ja: 懲役25年の服役刑に処する服役場所は―

translation.en: at the Lompoc maximum security prison system...
translation.ja: 懲役25年の服役刑に処する服役場所は― ロンポック連邦刑務所

translation.en: without the possibility of early parole. This court is adjourned. [ Gavel Raps ]
translation.ja: 早期の仮釈放は認めない以上で閉廷とする

translation.en: ♪She got a big ol' boom Yeah, throw that deep ♪
translation.ja: 危険なカーアクションです

translation.en: ♪I don't care if it's fat Put it all on me ♪
translation.ja: 撮影は閉鎖された道路で

translation.en: ♪I can see that thing in them jeans ♪
translation.ja: すべてプロが行っています

translation.en: ♪She move slow, fast Step on the gas ♪ ♪Stop, go With your foot on the floor ♪ ♪Green light, go ♪
